sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react'
import { Form, FormGroup, Label, Button, Input, Row, Container, Col } from 'reactstrap';

class Signup extends Component {

    state = {
        firstname: "",
        lastname: "",
        email: "",
        password: "",
        confirmPassword: ""
    }

    handleChange = (event) => {
        let { name, value} = event.target
        this.setState({ [name] : value })
    }

    render () {
        return (
            <Fragment>
                <Container>
                <Form>
                        <Row>
                            <Col xs="6">
                                <FormGroup>
                                    <Label for="firstname">Prénom</Label>
                                    <Input type="text" name="firstname"  placeholder="Prénom" value={this.state.firstname} onChange={this.handleChange}/>
                                </FormGroup>
                            </Col>
                            <Col xs="6">
                                <FormGroup>
                                    <Label for="lastname">Nom</Label>
                                    <Input type="text" name="lastname" placeholder="Nom" value={this.state.lastname} onChange={this.handleChange}/>
                                </FormGroup>
                            </Col>
                        </Row>
                        <FormGroup>
                            <Label for="email">Email</Label>
                            <Input type="email" name="email" placeholder="exemple@exemple.com" value={this.state.email} onChange={this.handleChange}/>
                        </FormGroup>
                        <FormGroup>
                            <Label for="password">Mot de passe</Label>
                            <Input type="password" name="password" placeholder="Mot de passe" value={this.state.password} onChange={this.handleChange}/>
                        </FormGroup>
                        <FormGroup>
                            <Label for="corfirmPassword">Mot de passe</Label>
                            <Input type="password" name="confirmPassword" placeholder="Confirmation du mot de passe" value={this.state.confirmPassword} onChange={this.handleChange}/>
                        </FormGroup>
                        <Button type="submit">S'inscrire</Button>
                    </Form>
                </Container>
            </Fragment>
        )
    }
}

export default Signup
